org.openrdf.sail

Interface AdvancedSailConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SailConnection
    Deprecated. 
    temporary interface introduced to avoid backward compatibility issues. Will be removed again in the next major release.

    @Deprecated
public interface AdvancedSailConnection
extends SailConnection
    Offers extra customisations beyond SailConnection.
    Since:
    2.8.2
    Author:
    MJAHale
